Metadata.title: Tenkir
Metadata.description: Tenkir is a simple and fun planning poker app. Simply create a room, share the room URL with your team members and start using it immediately.

Home.Simple and fun planning poker app: Simple and fun planning poker app.
Home.Create a room for planning poker: Create a room for planning poker
Home.Share the room URL with your team: Share the room URL with your team
